Literature Review: The 30Ã—30 initiative for climate change-integrated conservation strategies has gained significant momentum over the past two decades, with a growing recognition of the need to adapt conservation planning to the impacts of climate change. This review aims to provide an overview of the history and future of climate change-integrated conservation strategies, highlighting key concepts, recommendations, and challenges in this field.
